title: 5 wounded in Texas drive-by shootings, no arrests
content:
Police on Monday said the search continues for suspects believed to be in a dark-colored vehicle.
Police didn't immediately announce a possible motive in Sunday night's gunfire. Authorities say all five victims, who were outside a home, have gunshot injuries not believed to be life-threatening.
Police say the victims were three men, a woman and a 4-month-old baby. Police didn't immediately release the gender of the wounded infant.
